title: Twin Sense
description: two boys + two girls = one big messAs girlfriends of the Taylor twins, Layna and Sherri have only been friends by association. But when Sherri breaks up with Keith (for real this time), and Kevin gives Layna a promise ring (whoa, what?), Layna's whole world spins off balance. She avoids Kevin's unwelcome pressure to commit by spending more time with Sherri.Without the twins around, Layna and Sherri are tempted to go beyond friendship status. Then Keith tries to win Sherri back, and Kevin apologizes for rushing Layna. Now she's stuck inside a love quadrangle that has her reaching for the consolation cheesecake. The only way to sort out this mess is to make an impossible choice--between the one she wants and the other one she wants--or she might end up with no one.A delightful, fast-paced novella for fans of light YA romance with glbt characters. Recommended for age 14 & up.
author: Lydia Sharp
